item.title: Extract email IDs from Gmail
item.description: Hey people! Writing after a long time. Today I will explain how to scan your Gmail and extract all email IDs to a Google spreadsheet using Google apps script. 1. Go to google drive, create a new spreadsheet and give it a name. 2. Open the script editor. Tools -> Script Editor 3. Copy and paste the below code to the script editor and save the script with a name.
